Thanks for stopping by my website - i'm on a mission to tell powerful stories about products and problem-solving in the most captivating and inspiring ways. I am keen to work with new people, grow, design and build stuff. So feel free to reach out!

ABOUT ME

I have written extensively in the field of technological development, as well as building tech start-ups that attempt to solve real world problems. Most recently, I have focused on helping grow the adoption of the Web3 ecosystem, while problem solving complex issues related to its adoption.

EXPERIENCE

My goal is to combine creative thinking and design with an analytical approach to solve problems at the intersection of technology and business. I have a wide range of experience in analytical research, having started out as a Strategy Consultant for IBM in my penultimate year at university and later as an intern for the London Government, then as an Independent Community Analyst for Messari Hub.

SKILLS

My Skills are wide-ranging spanning across multiple creative, analytical and technical disciplines. I am in constant pursuit of skills that can help me develop as a well-rounded individual. I spend a lot of my free time learning coding and 3D graphic design, including modelling, rendering and animation.

COMPANIES & PROJECTS

Over the last 10 years, I've been the Founder and worked for two startup companies

Shaka Cuts

Shaka Cuts was a barber booking platform that allowed individuals to book haircuts. Over the course of the app we facilitated over 10,000 haircuts, targeting Greater London and Oxford. I was a member of the founding team and worked as Growth Lead within the development and marketing teams.

WHY WASTE A VOTE

10 years ago, I entered a national hackathon for technically gifted young developers and digital marketers aged 18 and under across the UK. My team and I was tasked with building an application using open government data. In turn, we created a website to help young people understand politics in order for them to make an informed decision when voting in the general elections.

ARTICLES

Fancy a good read?

My medium account provides investment research and analysis on esoteric digital assets while maintaining an easy-to-understand structure.
